Chinese: 这张图片中<object>的品牌是<Specific brand>吗？
这个<object>的制造商是<Specific producer>吗？
English: Is the brand of <object> in this picture <Specific brand>?
Is the manufacturer of this <object> <Specific producer>?

Chinese: 您能识别这张图片中<object>的品牌吗？
这张图片中<object>的品牌是什么？
这张图片中<object>是哪个国家的产品？
English: Can you identify the brand of <object> in this picture?
What is the brand of <object> in this picture?
Who is the producer of this <object>?
Which country's product is the <object> in this picture?
